subject: I love your Products!
description_text:
I love my Simsonn HB Pro handbrake! I really want to make all my equipment
Simsonn products ? im just not able to afford them right now being a sole
provider. My sim is my escape from the tough realities of life and having
products that work seamlessly and can take repeated hard usage, makes the
experience much more pleasant. The second I unboxed my HB pro I knew
instantly my pedals and shifter eill have to be Simsonn soon. I see you
guys are also coming out with a wheelbase soon, thats awesome. Ever since I
got my HB Pro I haven't shut up about it on discord and on Facebook alike.
I am starting to post my reels and videos as my drift skills get better and
I'd love to add an affiliate link to all the reels and vids just because I
like the product so much. Eventually ill be able to afford upgrading my
equipment from the thrustmaster T300rsGT and Th8a to all Simsonn stuff.
Just not able to right now.
Keep being amazing guys! Keep Making quality products!

U Davis

conversations.body_text: Hi, Nathan Davis    Thank you for your love and support. We're thrilled to deliver an exceptional racing experience for you. Look for us on your next purchase to get special discounts.

Thank you and I will.

U Davis

On Tue, Sep 30, 2025, 12:02â€¯AM service@simsonn.com
